title: I'm sick and tired of all these anti dyna.
body:
So I'm am going to tell all of them how to deal with the issue.

you really want dyna to go away? abuse the shit out of it. **Make** riot change it. all of your complaints fall on deaf ears, they can lose hundreds of you and it doesn't make a noticeable dent in their earnings. hundreds of hundreds can leave and it's still not a problem to them.

understand, that even this plan will take at the very least a month to activate, you need to be patient. complaining and threatening to leave will get you nowhere.

--------
For the record here, solo ought to be gone forever, and that's for the best. solo was never a good indication of every skill to begin with. only most of the selfish skills like laning phase where developed highly, whereas the other parts that matter, such as following team and playing teamfight role correctly, are underdeveloped throughout the regions. in the solo environment until you hit a fairly high skill cap (gold three-ish is where those skills generally start developing) those things are useless.

replies.body: Solo Q had flaws, the new Que had more flaws, that is the real issue

new queue has less flaws than solo did on release. that is the proper comparison btw. you need to give it some time to fix the kinks, just like solo prime. 

also, can we call old solo solo prime. a good way to distinguish old solo and the solo that most people want, which is true dynamic solo, or a mix of old and new concepts.

> [{quoted}](name=macromite,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rNVrhiNl,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-06-14T01:59:36.421+0000)
>
> new queue has less flaws than solo did on release. that is the proper comparison btw. you need to give it some time to fix the kinks, just like solo prime. 
> 
> also, can we call old solo solo prime. a good way to distinguish old solo and the solo that most people want, which is true dynamic solo, or a mix of old and new concepts.

Not really, we compare what we had to what we were given

"Prime" was worse than old solo que, going to solo Q was a step forward, DQ was worse than solo Q, going to DQ was a step backwards

For games, you don't compare version 1.0 to V2.0 you compare 2.0 to the last release patch 1.0 had, for this case, 1.9 will be the example I use

1.9 is worse than 2.0 by a good margin, we don't compare 2.0 to 1.0 because it is not what it was supposed to be improving from, it was supposed to be an improvement from 1.9, which it wasnt

Most people threaten to leave the game. Well guess what. I ACTUALLY left the game. 

Most people are like "Cya in a week or a day" Well what is my case then?

I made a year.

I suppose I should say that it will be hard to find a game that has what league has. league is the cornerstone in competitively casual multiplayer games.

'ave luck I suppose, but if you truly want to leave, you ought to stop using the boards, it will draw you in.

"you really want dyna to go away? abuse the shit out of it" Wait what, there's something solo players can abuse in it? Also, riot would never ever ever bring it back unless their "revenue" starts to drop really really hard because of the new trashy que. Legit, I don't play "ranked." Tried a few games, EXACTLY THE SAME EXPERIENCE THESE PEOPLE ON THE BOARDS HAVE, Assuming they were solo or duo.

Also, final note, I'm really sick of seeing 30 different posts daily, with none of them even adding anything of value or merit. just, stick to one big one that covers the whole thing and upvote to the heights you can achieve.

Actually, for the hell of it I challenge anyone who made it this far to make the post and send it to me. collect all of the relevant information discussed in pro and anti dyna discussions and put it all together in a single thread, then post a link here.
